Comments_List: A totally new perspective on the Bible and the ability to do my own textual interpretations of its stories.

One strength is that it operates on the flipped model, where you watch lectures outside of class and discuss them in class , but Professor Hayes is its ultimate strength. Her engagement with the course is unbelievable. Inspiring.

Whether you know all the bible stories or have never opened a bible, you will learn an incredible amount from this course. Highly recommended, but be aware that you will have to stay engaged throughout the semester to stay on top of this course.
